Educational Initiatives (Ei) are looking for Zonal Coordinators (5) and District Coordinators (24) to lead an assessment project in government schools across Jharkhand.

📌 Positions & Locations:
🔷 Zonal Coordinators (5) – Managing 4-6 districts each
🔷 District Coordinators (24) – One per district

📍 Who Can Apply?
✔ Qualification: Bachelor’s/Master’s in Education/Social Work (MSW, BSW, B.Ed., M.Ed.)
✔ Experience: 2-3 years in project management, training, hiring, and team management
✔ Skills: Stakeholder engagement, data tracking (Excel, Google Sheets), own conveyance & laptop
✔ Languages: Hindi, English & local languages
✔ Duration: 1-1.5 months (Starting March 2025)

💰 Compensation:
Zonal Coordinator: ₹30,000/month + Conveyance
District Coordinator: ₹20,000/month + Conveyance
📜 Certification: Experience Certificate from Ei upon successful completion

📩 How to Apply?
Send your CV to hiringnow.2025@gmail.com with the subject:
Application for Zonal/District Coordinator – [Zone/District Name]
or fill out the form https://lnkd.in/gEjPASf8

Complete Roadmap to learn Power BI 👇👇

Step 1: Power BI Basics 
1. Understand the Power BI ecosystem, including Power BI Desktop and Power BI Service. 
2. Learn to import data from different sources (Excel, SQL Server, CSV, etc.). 
3. Explore Power Query Editor for data transformation and cleaning. 
4. Practice creating basic visualizations like bar charts, line charts, and pie charts. 

Step 2: Intermediate Power BI 
1. Dive deeper into data modeling concepts such as relationships, calculated columns, and 
measures. 
2. Learn about DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) for advanced calculations and 
aggregations. 
3. Explore Power BI visuals and custom visuals for enhanced data visualization.
